casebody.data:
No. 321,

Misc.

Sampedro v. Puerto Rico. Gerardo Ortiz del Rivero for petitioner. J. B. Ferrimidez Badillo, Attorney General of Puerto Rico, and Arturo Estrella, Assistant .Attorney General, for respondent.

C. A. 1st Cir. Certiorari denied.

Mr. Justice Douglas is of the opinion that certiorari sholild be granted.
